effect.black-white: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
effect.black-2-white-2: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

short_effect.black-white: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
short_effect.black-2-white-2: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

flavor_text.black-white: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. It may also freeze the target solid.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. It may also freeze the target solid.
